name: Extractors: The Hanging Worlds of Zarg
name_original: Extractors: The Hanging Worlds of Zarg
description:
Extractors: The Hanging Worlds of Zarg is an arcade game developed by East Point Software and Millenium Interactive. It came out on 01-01-1994. It was published by Nova Spring.
You can play Extractors: The Hanging Worlds of Zarg on PC.
It was scored by Richard Joseph.
